metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39154 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: XStream is a simple library to serialize objects to XML and back again. Inaffected versions this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to loadand execute arbitrary code from a remote host only by manipulating theprocessed input stream. No user is affected, who followed therecommendation to setup XStream's security framework with a whitelistlimited to the minimal required types. XStream 1.4.18 uses no longer ablacklist by default, since it cannot be secured for general purpose.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
